product_name: REI Buffalo Plaid Tie-Up Hat - Boys'
long_description: Lined with soft polyester fleece and warm insulation, the Elmer Fudd-approved REI Buffalo Plaid Tie-Up cap helps keep your boy's head toasty while hunting wabbits or going for a cold-weather hike. Polyester/wool exterior, soft microfleece lining at the crown and a touch of polyester insulation add warmth. Polyester sherpa fleece lines the earflaps for next-to-skin comfort; earflaps fold up and fasten in place when not needed.
